invite_register.benefit2: Receive updates on our new products.
invite_register.benefit3: Enjoy members-only offers such as gift sending service
invite_register.benefit5: Check your order summary and shipment date

reset.line1: We have sent to your email a link to reset your password.

reset.line3: You will be automatically logged in once you have reset your password. Alternatively, log in from below after you have reset your password.

top.lead: From Japanese citrus fruits to quintessentially British marmalades
top.key_message:
We are a small, independent, craft marmalade maker, excelling in turning high-quality citrus fruits grown in Japan into authentically British style preserves.

The result is bright and tangy marmalades that help you discover the beauty of the Japanese citrus variety and bring you back to the breakfast table from your childhood.

We hope you enjoy our jars!
top.description:
We carefully source farmers from all over Japan, especially those who grow fruits either organically or without waxes. So all of the fruits we use are excellent to taste and safe to eat.

Most of our marmalades are made following traditional British recipes, with meticulous attention to the set so that you will get the best taste of jelly as well as fragrant peels. Sometimes we add some adjustments to the recipe, then it draws out the best from Japanese, distinctive fruits.

how_to_shop.lead: We ship our products to anywhere in Japan. Please enjoy your online shopping!
how_to_shop.line1: Select your marmalades and add them to your cart.
how_to_shop.line2c: in advance. Your shopping experience will become simple and easy.
how_to_shop.line3a: Become a member and you can enjoy our
how_to_shop.line4: Your order will be delivered directly to your doorstep!

products_list.lead: We produce all of our marmalades and jams by hand in small batches. Each product is in stock during its season and for a short period only. It tends to sell out soon, so if you like any of our jars, place an order quickly!
products_list.lead2: When we add a product to “Currently in Season”, it means that the product is in stock or out of stock only temporarily. Any products that we shortly add to the stock list will also appear in this section.

product.note: Tap an item you want to order, then select a quantity and add the item to cart.
product.remove: Are you sure you want to remove this item?

line.lead: Follow us on our LINE or Facebook account dedicated to English speaking customers and/or Instagram. We will keep you updated on our products!

product.soldout: Size 150g is sold out and currently out of stock. Stay connected with us on LINE or Instagram so that we can let you know if it is back in stock.

current.lead: We are working hard to get our products ready. Our next products will be ready around the end of March 2022.

product.limit: Due to limited availability, we have one item per customer policy for this product.

loaf.lead: Please note the following when placing an order.
loaf.main:
1. This item will be produced and shipped on Sunday 24 April, 2022. Delivery will take one day for Tokyo and Osaka areas, and two days for Kyushu area. Please receive your order as soon as possible.
2. The product is best before five days from the date of production.

timing.text: Currently, we ship our products to addresses in Japan only. We usually ship your order within one week after your purchase. After we ship the products, the delivery can take up to three days, depending on your location.

shipping.line1: We offer two shipping options to choose from.
shipping.line3: Please see below for details and the cost of each option.

takkyuubin.p3: If we need to send your order in more than one package, the shipping cost will be automatically calculated when you place the order. You can check how much the shipping costs before you make the payment.
takkyuubin.p4: This option is also suitable when you want to send a package to your family or friends as a gift.
takkyuubin.p5: Registered customers are eligible for a free
takkyuubin.p5-2: where we will enclose a lovely card with a message of your choice printed.

compact.p3: One package can contain up to six 100g jars.
compact.p4: If you order more than seven 100g jars, we will automatically arrange additional packages.
compact.p5: This option is suitable when you purchase the products for home use. If you want to send a package as a gift, we recommend you select TA-Q-BIN.

checkout.card_note: We accept payment by credit card only. Stripe, a payment service provider, will process your payment on our behalf. We do not store your credit card details. They are securely maintained in our payment provider's systems.

gift.title: A charming gift idea
gift.description: Send aya & co.'s little black jars as gifts by post that will be gently wrapped in natural, wooden threads from pine trees grown in Kochi prefecture. Whether it's a birthday gift or something to say 'thank you', you can order a card with the appropriate message and your name on it.<br class='lg'>This service is available free of charge to all registered customers.

message.title: Select a message
message.line1: You can select which message to print on your card from:
message.line2: We will design and print your choice of message on a white-based postcard. Information about aya & co. will be printed on the backside.
message.line3: If you would like us to print any other message, there is a space for you to leave us a note while you place an order.

name.title: Print your name on the card
name.line1: We are happy to print your name on the card so that it will be personalised. You can select how to print your name: either your full name or first name only.

order.title: How to order
order.line1: Gift sending service is available to all registered customers free of charge. Please make sure to select 'TA-Q-BIN' or 'TA-Q-BIN (larger size)' as the delivery method when you order this service, as 'TA-Q-BIN Compact' is too small to enclose a card.
order.line2: and proceed to checkout while you are logged in. You can select a message card to send once you have selected 'TA-Q-BIN' or 'TA-Q-BIN (larger size)'.
order.line3: Please contact us by our official LINE or Facebook accounts dedicated to English speaking customers or Instagram if you have any questions about our gift sending service.

sustainability.lead: Learn about how we make our effort to achieve sustainable packaging.
sustainability.title: Natural Packaging
sustainability.p1: One of the first projects I worked on when I decided to start my online marmalade brand was to achieve sustainable packaging, which I believe any online shop owner is responsible for considering.
sustainability.p2: What can we do to avoid using plastic or paper cushioning while ensuring our products will be delivered to our customers safely?
sustainability.p3: After some careful thought, we decided to use 'wooden threads' (aka 'moku-men' = 木毛 in Japanese) to wrap and protect our jars from damages during shipment.
sustainability.p4: Moku-men, thin wooden threads made from trees such as pines, is a traditional, Japanese item for natural packaging. It was widely used in Japan until the mid 20th century when it was replaced by plastics. Nowadays, there is only one company specializing in Moku-men in Kochi Prefecture. Moku-men is considered to be beneficial for protecting forests in Japan as old trees need to be cut regularly to be replaced by new ones. Such old trees are used to produce moku-men.
sustainability.p5: An additional bonus is that you will enjoy the natural scent from the wooden threads when you open the package.

price.content: The price of each product is shown on the product page.

shipment.lead: When will my order be shipped?
shipment.content: We do our best to ship your order within one week of your purchase unless otherwise stated on the product page. If it is likely to be delayed, we will notify you by email.

time.lead: Can I specify what time I would like to receive the delivery?
time.content: You can specify what time you receive the delivery when you place an order.

payment.content: We accept credit card payment only.

return.content1: We maintain our products at a high standard. Please open your parcel as soon as it is delivered.
return.content2: If your products are damaged during shipment, please notify us by email within seven days after your order was delivered. Please keep the confirmation of shipment once you return the products to us.
return.lead2: 2. Can I return or exchange items for personal reasons?
return.content3: You cannot return or exchange items for personal reasons. We will not be able to accept returns after you open the jar and taste the products.
return.lead3: 3. How can I return items when I received wrong or damaged items?
return.content4: We will re-send and/or exchange the items at our costs if we shipped the wrong items, or the products are faulty, or they are damaged during shipment. We will notify and refund you if the products you ordered are no longer available.

about.contact: Please contact by this enquiry form or adding my official English LINE account.

privacy.lead: aya & co. (hereafter referred to as 'we' or 'us') takes the protection of personal information seriously and ensures that we have established a policy on the protection of personal information for the services provided on this website (hereafter referred to as 'the Service'). We will protect personal information by establishing a system for its protection and by ensuring that the importance of such protection is fully recognized and addressed.

a1.p1: 1. Personal information refers to the information as defined in the Personal Information Protection Law in Japan and is any information relating to a living individual that can be used to identify that individual by name, address, telephone number, contact details, or any other description contained in the information.
a1.p2: 2. Among personal information, 'review history and characteristic information' refers to information other than 'personal information', such as services used, products purchased, history of page viewed and advertisements, search keywords, usage dates, usage methods, usage environment, postal code, gender, occupation, age, IP address, cookie information, location information, individual device identification information, individual identification information of the terminal, etc.

a2.p1: 1. This service may ask for personal information such as name, birthdates, address, telephone number and email address when the user registers as a member and/or purchase our products.
a2.p2: 2. In this service, we do not collect historical and characteristic information.

a3.lead: Why do we collect and use personal information?
a3.p1: The purpose of collecting and using personal information in this service is as follows:
a3.p2: 1. To allow the user to view and modify their data, such as name, address, emails, purchase history, etc.
a3.p3: 2. To use the user's information such as name, address, email address, etc. to send notifications and products to the customer and to contact the customer when necessary.
a3.p4: 3. To use information relating to payment such as the name and quantity of goods ordered, the amount of money charged, the user's name, address, credit card number, etc. for the purpose of billing.
a3.p5: 4. To display the registered information on the input screen to make it easy for the user to input data when ordering products.
a3.p6: 5. To identify personal information, such as the user's name, address, phone and email to refuse the use of customers who have violated the terms of this service, such as delaying payment or causing damage, or customers who are trying to use the service for illegal or improper purposes.
a3.p7: 6. To respond to the customer's enquiries.
a3.p8: 7. Any additional reasons for the above.

a4.p1: We will keep the personal information of our customers accurate and up-to-date, and prevent unauthorized access, loss, damage, falsification and leakage of personal information by taking the necessary measures such as maintaining a security system, improving the management system and thorough employee training, and implementing safety measures to ensure the strict management of personal information.

a5.p1:
1. In the event that the customer requests the disclosure of the customer's own personal information, we will do so without delay. However, if the disclosure of personal information falls under any of the following cases, we may not display all or part of the information, and if we decide not to display the information, we will notify the customer to that effect without delay.:
If the disclosure is likely to harm the life, body, property or other rights or interests of the customer or a third party
If the disclosure is likely to significantly interfere with the proper operation of the company's business
In the event of any other violation of the law
a5.p2: 2. Notwithstanding the above, we will not, in principle, disclose any information other than personal information including review history and characteristic information.

a6.lead: Disclosure of personal information to third parties
a6.p1:
1. The personal information we receive from our customers will be managed appropriately and will not be provided to any third party without the prior consent of the customer, except in cases permitted by the Personal Information Protection Law in Japan and other applicable laws and regulations.:
Where required by law
Where it is necessary for the protection of the life, body or property of a person and it is difficult to obtain the consent of the person
Where it is particularly necessary for the improvement of public health or the promotion of the healthy development of children, it is difficult to obtain the consent of the person concerned.
Where it is necessary to cooperate with a national agency, a local public body, or a party entrusted by either of the foregoing to carry out tasks prescribed by law, and obtaining the consent of the person concerned is likely to impede the completion of such tasks.
When the following matters are notified or announced in advance:
The disclosure to the third party is included in the purpose of use.
Section of data to be provided to third parties
The means of how the information will be disclosed to third parties
To stop the disclosure of personal information to third parties at the request of the individual
a6.p2:
2. Notwithstanding the above, the following cases shall not be considered as third parties
In the case of entrusting all or part of personal information within the scope necessary to achieve the purpose of use
when personal information is disclosed as a result of the succession of business due to a merger or other reasons.
In cases where personal information is used jointly with a specific person, the user shall be notified in advance of the purpose of use, the name of the person responsible for the management of the personal information, and the purpose of use of the joint use.

a7.p1: This service has taken all possible measures to ensure the security of personal information in order to ensure its accuracy and security. We will always strive to collect information on the protection of personal information and to ensure that the latest security measures are taken.

a8.lead: Correction and deletion of personal information
a8.p1: 1. If the personal information held by this Service about the individual is incorrect, the user may request the amendment or deletion of the personal data by following the procedures set out in this document.
a8.p2: 2. In the event that the Service receives a request from a user as per the above and deems it necessary to respond to such request, the Service will, without delay, carry out the correction or deletion of the relevant personal information and notify the user of such correction or deletion.

a9.lead: Suspension of use of personal information
a9.p1: When we are requested by a user to stop using or erase (hereafter referred to as 'stop using') personal information due to a reason beyond the scope of the purpose of the use or that it has been obtained illegally, we will carryout the necessary investigation without delay and based on the result, we will stop using the personal information and notify the user to that effect. However, in the case that it costs a lot of money to stop using personal information, or it is difficult to stop using personal information, alternative measures will be taken.

a10.lead: Compliance with laws and regulations and changes to the privacy policy
a10.p1: 1. This Service complies with all applicable Japanese laws and regulations regarding personal information held.
a10.p2: 2. The content of the privacy policy may be changed at any time without notice to the user.
a10.p3: 3. Unless otherwise specified by the Service, the revised privacy policy will take effect when it is published on this website.

a11.p1: Ayako Ueda, the Founder of aya & co.

a12.p1: For any enquiries regarding the privacy policy and handling of personal information in this Service, please contact the following contact point.
a12.p2:
Ayako Ueda
aya & co.
1-6-1-505 Arima, Miyamae-ku, Kawasaki-shi, Kanagawa, 216-0003, Japan
